schema.description: 场景信息。更多信息，请参见[参数说明](~~201321~~) 。
schema.example: {"loadConfig":{"agentCount":1,"apiLoadConfigList":[{"rpsBegin":10,"rpsLimit":100}],"configuration":{"allRpsBegin":10,"allRpsLimit":100},"maxRunningTime":1,"testMode":"tps_mode"},"relationList":[{"apiList":[{"apiName":"链路1的第一个API","body":{"bodyValue":"{\"key1\":\"111\",\"key2\":\"222\"}","contentType":"application/x-www-form-urlencoded"},"checkPointList":[{"checkPoint":"userId","checkType":"EXPORTED_PARAM","expectValue":"111","operator":"ctn"}],"exportList":[{"exportName":"userId","exportType":"STATUS_CODE"}],"headerList":[{"headerName":"userName","headerValue":"张三"}],"method":"GET","url":"https://www.aliyundoc.com"}],"relationName":"链路1"}],"sceneName":"xing-测试OpenAPI-1"}

Message.description: 错误提示信息，如果成功则不返回任何数据。
Message.example: 创建或者修改场景入参必须是实体类Scene的JSON串

HttpStatusCode.description: HTTP状态码，成功则不返回任何数据。

Code.description: 系统状态码，成功则不返回任何数据。

Success.description:
是否成功。
- true：成功
- false：失败

title: 创建场景
